name: Infinihell
description:
Controls

Aim with mouse

Left-click: Shoot

Move: WASD

A simple, classic, bullet hell. . . that never ends. Shoot the blocks that shoot you, which is all of them, just shoot everything. This game will have new features added on later such as some more enemy types. Everything was made by me. Finally, have fun! I'm sorry to those on Safari and whatnot, but this uses WebGL2.
